kardinal offishall: : im from a city where the go getters get that gold quick and get that gwop and lay both money and the chicks nobody has a monopoly over grindin some people pull the clips out with no rhymin they the pushers but i dont have malice though they smoke everything without touchin the chalice though i tried to give a damn aint nobody want it though so i held on to it and took it personal i lived around crack dealers and preachers street graduates becoming the teachers politicians talkin they couldnt reach us so we becoming the six oclock features dont study me you wont graduate but my lifes good money you cant tabulate get that doe but hold your head high a piece aint enough we deserving the whole pie

: dear mr. parker you made me this monster cause what dont kill me makes me strong and i decide where i belong dear ms. mahalia got something to tell ya if they never made you they can never break you just remain the real truth you decide your fate go on

: if you cant take the heat then why you got your hand out in hells kitchen the regular never stand out in high school they told me i wouldnt be nothin wouldnt make it out the turf wouldnt see nothin they saw my gang and made up they mind quick but i would never let the evil in their minds stick further more some of the hoodlums i ran with are doctors and lawyers trick i hope you feelin it watchin us on television with your daughters say cheese girl wave to your father while his life is welcome back carter im at the acc with shawn carter backstage thinkin look at my life now. i done did good got a house in a white town just so that whenever them white folks talk they gotta respect the rapper who bought the whole block

: dear mr. parker you made me this monster cause what dont kill me makes me strong and i decide where i belong dear ms. mahalia got something to tell ya if they never made you they can never break you just remain the real truth you decide your fate go on

: the teachers got the kids from nine to three but we got em 24/7 in they i.p.o.d so respect my p.o.v when im fillin their ears with love thats on me see the driver in the fancy car thats on me but it is only a fraction of who i be never leave my common sense like no i.d what my daddy taught me got me into v.i.p you see
